mapper.sql: SELECT BOARD_NO boardNo, NICKNAME nickname, BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDate, SELECT_COUNT selectCount FROM TB_FREEBOARD JOIN TB_USER ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE TB_FREEBOARD.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FREEBOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FREEBOARD SET SELECT_COUNT = SELECT_COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FREEBOARD_ATTACH_FILE ( FILE_NO, FILE_TYPE, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FBFNO.NEXTVAL, #{fileType}, SEQ_FBBNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath} )
INSERT INTO TB_FREEBOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_FBBNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardWriter}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO fileNo, FILE_TYPE fileType, REF_BNO refBno, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CHANGE_NAME changeName, UPLOAD_DATE uploadDate, FILE_PATH filePath FROM TB_FREEBOARD_ATTACH_FILE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{refBno} AND FILE_TYPE = #{fileType}
